

% Include the styling.
\include{Style}

%%% Document
\begin{document}
	% Pages before the chapters will be numbered with roman numerals i,ii ...
	\pagenumbering{roman}
	
	\include{TitlePage}
	\include{Abstract}
	
	% Now add the fancy title ontop of the pages.
	\pagestyle{fancy}
	
	% Auto generated ToC
	\tableofcontents
	
	% Put headers on the pages.
	\include{Acknowledgments}
	
	% Page numbering back to 1,2,3... this resets the page count to 1.
	\pagenumbering{arabic}
	
	% These chapters are just examples.
	% Copy Chapter_TEMPLATE for your own chapters.
	\include{Chapter_Introduction/Chapter_Introduction}
	\include{Chapter_Approaches/Chapter_Approaches}
	\include{Chapter_FinalApproach/Chapter_FinalApproach}
	
	% Chapters specific to the project should be put in here.
	\include{Chapter_TEMPLATE/Chapter_TEMPLATE}
	
	
	\include{Chapter_Conclusion/Chapter_Conclusion}
	
	\include{References}
	
	\input{Appendices}

\end{document}
